thread.title: Shooting suspect charged with attempting to kill officers
thread.title_full: Shooting suspect charged with attempting to kill officers - StarTribune.com

author: startribune.com
title: Shooting suspect charged with attempting to kill officers
text:
WILKES-BARRE, Pa. â€” State police say a man who randomly fired a rifle in the parking lot of a northeastern Pennsylvania shopping center faces charges including attempted homicide of a law enforcement officer.
State police say 34-year-old Scott Lee Sargent opened fire Saturday outside a Wal-Mart in Wilkes-Barre (WILKS'-ba-ree), striking vehicles. The man shot at local police when they arrived and they returned fire. Sargent was struck, and police took him into custody. No one else was injured.
Sargent was taken to a hospital for treatment, where he was being guarded by state police pending medical clearance for arraignment.
He also faces charges of assault of a law enforcement officer and reckless endangerment, among other things.
A telephone listing for Sargent couldn't be found.
